Appscendâ€™s mission is to help companies thrive in their mobile challenges by making use of our experience that spans across 7 years and hundreds of mobile & cloud projects deployed.
We starting building Appscend back in 2009 based on our belief that app development should be accessible to any company regardless of its size. Since then, our visual studio and framework products were key building blocks for over 500 cross platform mobile apps.
